class.necroWarrior.name: Necro Warrior
class.necroWarrior.description: Fearsome warriors who have been imbued with dark necrotic energies, granting them power over the undead and unholy resilience.
class.boneSorcerer.name: Bone Sorcerer
class.boneSorcerer.description: Spellcasters whose magic flows from the power locked within bones, summoning skeletal minions and conjuring bone-armored barriers.
class.deathCleric.name: Death Cleric
class.deathCleric.description: Clerics devoted to the gods of death, empowered with the ability to heal the living and harm the undead, commanding both with equal mastery.
class.lichEnvoy.name: Lich Envoy
class.lichEnvoy.depiction: Messengers and heralds for ancient liches, possessing fragments of their masters' necromantic powers and their insidious will.
class.reaper.name: Reaper
class.reaper.depiction: Mystic warriors who walk the boundary between life and death, able to sever the threads of life with their ethereal scythes.
class.ghostlyDuelist.name: Ghostly Duelist
class.ghostlyDuelist.depiction: Ethereal fencers who have mastered the art of incorporeal combat, striking terror and cold steel through their opponents.
class.spiritBinder.name: Spirit Binder
class.spiritBinder.depiction: Conjurers who can bind and command spirits from beyond, compelling them to share their spectral might.
class.zombieLord.name: Zombie Lord
class.zombieLord.depiction: Commanders of the rotting hordes, these lords have authority over zombies, controlling and empowering them through dark magics.
class.graveWarden.name: Grave Warden
class.graveWarden.depiction: Guardians of the sacred burial sites, these solemn warriors can call forth spectral defenders and wield grave dust as a weapon.
class.soulMage.name: Soul Mage
class.soulMage.depiction: Arcanists who traffic in souls, they can manipulate life force to heal or destroy, and meddle with the fabric of existence.
trait.deadlyCommand.name: Deadly Command
trait.deadlyCommand.description: Allows the Necro Warrior to issue commands to undead minions, boosting their attack and defense capabilities.
trait.unholyVigor.name: Unholy Vigor
trait.unholyVigor.description: Provides the Necro Warrior with increased hit points and resistance to necrotic damage.
trait.skeletalAffinity.name: Skeletal Affinity
trait.skeletalAffinity.description: Grants the Bone Sorcerer a bond with skeletal creatures, enhancing their summoning and control over them.
trait.boneWarding.name: Bone Warding
trait.boneWarding.description: Creates a protective barrier made of bone around the Bone Sorcerer, absorbing a portion of incoming damage.
trait.ritualOfFinality.name: Ritual of Finality
trait.ritualOfFinality.description: Enables the Death Cleric to perform a powerful ritual that heavily damages undead or heals the living.
trait.deathlyDominion.name: Deathly Dominion
trait.deathlyDominion.description: Gives the Death Cleric increased influence over the undead, allowing them to command or repel them.
trait.lichLegacy.name: Lich Legacy
trait.lichLegacy.description: The Lich Envoy carries the knowledge of liches, allowing them access to ancient spells and rituals.
trait.paralyzingGaze.name: Paralyzing Gaze
trait.paralyzingGaze.description: The Lich Envoy can paralyze a foe with a piercing gaze, instilling deep fear and immobility.
trait.soulHarvest.name: Soul Harvest
trait.soulHarvest.description: Reapers can harvest the souls of their fallen enemies, using them to empower their own abilities.
trait.etherStride.name: Ether Stride
trait.etherStride.description: Grants the Reaper the ability to step through the ethereal plane for short bursts, effectively teleporting short distances.
trait.phantomFinesse.name: Phantom Finesse
trait.phantomFinesse.description: Grants the Ghostly Duelist enhanced dexterity and the ability to pass weapons through solid objects as if they were ethereal.
trait.spectralParry.name: Spectral Parry
trait.spectralParry.description: Enables the Ghostly Duelist to parry physical attacks, briefly turning insubstantial to avoid damage.
trait.spectralChain.name: Spectral Chain
trait.spectralChain.description: Provides the Spirit Binder with the ability to bind spirits to their will, forcing them to aid in battle or perform tasks.
trait.spiritualCommunion.name: Spiritual Communion
trait.spiritualCommunion.description: Allows the Spirit Binder to communicate with spirits and gain information or request guidance.
trait.rotCommander.name: Rot Commander
trait.rotCommander.description: The Zombie Lord can directly control rotting minions, coordinating their attacks and bolstering their endurance.
trait.necroticReinforcement.name: Necrotic Reinforcement
trait.necroticReinforcement.description: The Zombie Lord can strengthen their undead servants, making them tougher and more resilient against attacks.
trait.tombGuardian.name: Tomb Guardian
trait.tombGuardian.description: As keepers of the dead, Grave Wardens can summon ethereal defenders from the tombs they guard.
trait.dustOfTheDeparted.name: Dust of the Departed
trait.dustOfTheDeparted.description: Enables the Grave Warden to wield the ashen remains of the dead as a debilitating weapon against their enemies.
trait.soulSiphon.name: Soul Siphon
trait.soulSiphon.description: The Soul Mage can drain the life force from others to rejuvenate themselves or empower their spells.
trait.ethericInsight.name: Etheric Insight
trait.ethericInsight.description: Grants the Soul Mage the ability to see into the ethereal plane and perceive the true essence of living beings.
ability.animateDeadWarrior.name: Animate Dead Warrior
ability.animateDeadWarrior.description: Empowers the Necro Warrior to raise a fallen warrior as an undead minion, achieving greater strength and combat prowess.
ability.deathlyAura.name: Deathly Aura
ability.deathlyAura.description: The Necro Warrior emanates a chilling aura that weakens enemies within range and bolsters undead allies.
ability.skeletalSummoning.name: Skeletal Summoning
ability.skeletalSummoning.description: This ability allows the Bone Sorcerer to summon skeletal creatures to fight alongside them, which are more durable and potent than regular skeletons.
ability.osseousEmpowerment.name: Osseous Empowerment
ability.osseousEmpowerment.description: Enhances the Bone Sorcerer's skeletal summons or bone-constructed armaments, granting them extraordinary hardness and deadliness.
ability.necroticTouch.name: Necrotic Touch
ability.necroticTouch.description: Allows the Death Cleric to touch a being, delivering a concentrated burst of necrotic energy that either harms or heals, depending on the nature of the target.
ability.spiritGuardian.name: Spirit Guardian
ability.spiritGuardian.description: Summons a protective spirit that guards the Death Cleric, attacking or hindering foes that come too close.
ability.phylacteryLink.name: Phylactery Link
ability.phylacteryLink.description: The Lich Envoy shares a link with their master's phylactery, allowing them to draw on its power or communicate through it.
ability.fearOfTheAncients.name: Fear of the Ancients
ability.fearOfTheAncients.description: Harnesses the ancient and dreadful presence of liches to instill terror in the hearts of enemies, possibly causing them to flee or freeze in fear.
ability.soulCleave.name: Soul Cleave
ability.soulCleave.description: With a swing of their ethereal scythe, the Reaper cuts through both body and soul, dealing damage to physical form and draining life essence.
ability.deathStep.name: Death Step
ability.deathStep.description: The Reaper blinks across the battlefield, moving instantly from one point to another within sight, leaving behind a trail of chilling mist.
ability.etherealLunge.name: Ethereal Lunge
ability.etherealLunge.description: Allows the Ghostly Duelist to perform a lunge that passes through obstacles and can strike directly at an opponent's life force.
ability.disembodiedManeuver.name: Disembodied Maneuver
ability.disembodiedManeuver.description: The Ghostly Duelist temporarily becomes insubstantial, gaining the ability to move through solid objects and avoid most physical attacks.
ability.ectoplasmicBond.name: Ectoplasmic Bond
ability.ectoplasmicBond.description: Creates a bond between the Spirit Binder and a spirit, allowing them to gain a spectral ally or draw upon the spirit's unique abilities.
ability.soulShackle.name: Soul Shackle
ability.soulShackle.description: The Spirit Binder ensnares the soul of a target, hindering their movements and causing them anguish that can manifest as physical pain.
ability.zombieMastery.name: Zombie Mastery
ability.zombieMastery.description: Enables the Zombie Lord to exert their will over zombies, commanding them to perform complex tasks or fight with increased ferocity.
ability.decayAura.name: Decay Aura
ability.decayAura.description: The Zombie Lord emits an aura of decay that weakens the defenses of enemies while invigorating their own undead legions.
ability.crypticBarrier.name: Cryptic Barrier
ability.crypticBarrier.description: The Grave Warden conjures a wall of ethereal energy sourced from the crypts they protect, blocking attacks and creating an obstacle for enemies.
ability.silenceOfTheGraves.name: Silence of the Graves
ability.silenceOfTheGraves.description: Invokes the quiet of the tomb, suppressing noise and spells in an area, making it ideal for ambushes or clandestine activities.
ability.lifeTransference.name: Life Transference
ability.lifeTransference.description: The Soul Mage can transfer life force between creatures, healing one by sapping the vitality of another.
ability.soulStorm.name: Soul Storm
ability.soulStorm.description: Unleashes a tempest of tormented souls around the Soul Mage, dealing damage and causing emotional turmoil in those caught within.
